description: Applies forces to a graph to produce a layout based on node and edge relationships.

input.name: graph
input.description: An object containing nodes and edges.

input.name: repulsion
input.description: How much each node should node push each other away. Defaults to 400.0.

input.name: damping
input.description: The amount to lessen the force to be applied. Defaults to 0.5.

input.name: minEnergyThreshold
input.description: The minimum amount of force that should be applied. Defaults to null.

input.name: maxSpeed
input.description: The maximum amount of speed that should be applied. Defaults to null.

output.name: graph
output.description: An object containing nodes and edges, now with x/y attributes applied to each node.
